snippet: President Obama implored journalists on Friday to subject Mr. Trump’s proposals to intense scrutiny now that he is the presumptive Republican nominee.
abstract: Pres Obama says during White House news conference that Donald J Trump should be put under serious scrutiny, arguing all presidential candidates' campaign promises and policy positions should be assessed.
lead_paragraph: President Obama implored journalists on Friday to subject Mr. Trump’s proposals to intense scrutiny now that he is the presumptive Republican nominee.

headline.main: Obama Makes Case Against Donald Trump, Saying Presidency ‘Is Not a Reality Show’
headline.print_headline: Obama Says Trump Should Be Subjected to ‘Genuine Scrutiny’
